name: Hero's Haberdashery
description:
• Order resources from the Quest Board behind the counter.
  • Craft Items in the Forge to the left.
  • After upgrading your shop, the Quest Board order dropdown can be used to change Wheat -> Wood

Sell to as many customers as you can!

Next steps for this project: Clean up the UX for what you can interact with, what upgrading does, and what immediate attention items may be available to the player (e.g. out of a resource)

Thanks everyone who's played so far for the kind words and helpful feedback!

This is our team's second hackathon project together!

Four person team built out all code and assets from scratch, pulling sound effects from Freesound.org. Music by Lafe King

Writing, Sound Design: twitter.com/emenches

Character Programming and Art: twitter.com/froshiz

System Programming: twitter.com/gkgames

Background and Resource Arttwitter.com/mish_mash_masha

Music Track from: Lafe King
